title: Mr Ikegami's flight
brief_description: Mr Ikegami is in Sydney on business. Back in Tokyo, his wife Seisuko is expecting their first child. A tale of divided loyalties. Features Kazuhiro Muroyama as Mr Ikegami. Japanese/English with English subtitles. Original format 35 mm
